item.title: Adapters: A Compact and Extensible Transfer Learning Method for NLP
item.description: Adapters: A Compact and Extensible Transfer Learning Method for NLP [ read more ] Adapters obtain comparable results to BERT on several NLP tasks while achieving parameter efficiency. 5 min read Multi-Class Text Classification with Scikit-Learn [ read more ] There are lots of applications of text classification in the commercial world.
